languages.text: {n}Аврилла немного бледнеет, но вытягивается по струнке и четко говорит:{/n} "Прошу прощения, Лорд-капитан. Я приму меры, чтоб подобная ситуация не повторилась".
{n}Vent pales slightly, but straightens up and clips out,{/n} "Forgive me, Lord Captain. I will take steps to ensure such a thing does not happen again."
languages.original_text: {n}Аврилла немного бледнеет, но вытягивается по струнке и четко говорит:{/n} "Прошу прощения, Лорд-капитан. Я приму меры, чтоб подобная ситуация не повторилась".

traits.locale_text: {n}Vent pales slightly, but straightens up and clips out,{/n} "Forgive me, Lord Captain. I will take steps to ensure such a thing does not happen again."
{n}Vent pales slightly, but straightens up and clips out,{/n} "Forgive me, Lord Captain. I will take steps to ensure such a thing does not happen again."
{n}Vent pales slightly, but straightens up and clips out,{/n} "Forgive me, Lord Captain. I will take steps to ensure such a thing does not happen again."
{n}Vent pales slightly, but straightens up and clips out,{/n} "Forgive me, Lord Captain. I will take steps to ensure such a thing does not happen again."

languages.text: {n}温特脸色微微发白，但随后直起了身子。{/n}“请原谅，舰长大人。我会采取措施，确保这样的事情再也不会发生。”
languages.original_text: {n}Vent pales slightly, but straightens up and clips out,{/n} "Forgive me, Lord Captain. I will take steps to ensure such a thing does not happen again."

traits.locale_text: {n}温特脸色微微发白，但随后直起了身子。{/n}“请原谅，舰长大人。我会采取措施，确保这样的事情再也不会发生。”

languages.text: {n}Vent palidece ligeramente, pero se pone firme y responde:{/n} «Mis disculpas, Lord Capitán. Tomaré medidas para que esto no vuelva a suceder».
languages.original_text: {n}Vent pales slightly, but straightens up and clips out,{/n} "Forgive me, Lord Captain. I will take steps to ensure such a thing does not happen again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vent palidece ligeramente, pero se pone firme y responde:{/n} «Mis disculpas, Lord Capitán. Tomaré medidas para que esto no vuelva a suceder».

languages.text: {n}ヴェントは少し青ざめたが、背筋を伸ばして切り出した。{/n}「お許しを、ロード・キャプテン。二度とこのようなことが起こらないよう、対策を講じます」
languages.original_text: {n}Vent pales slightly, but straightens up and clips out,{/n} "Forgive me, Lord Captain. I will take steps to ensure such a thing does not happen again."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴェントは少し青ざめたが、背筋を伸ばして切り出した。{/n}「お許しを、ロード・キャプテン。二度とこのようなことが起こらないよう、対策を講じます」

languages.text: {n}Vent verblasst leicht, richtet sich jedoch auf und sagt:{/n} "Vergebt mir, Lord Captain. Ich sorge dafür, dass das nie wieder geschieht."
languages.original_text: {n}Vent pales slightly, but straightens up and clips out,{/n} "Forgive me, Lord Captain. I will take steps to ensure such a thing does not happen again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vent verblasst leicht, richtet sich jedoch auf und sagt:{/n} "Vergebt mir, Lord Captain. Ich sorge dafür, dass das nie wieder geschieht."

languages.text: {n}Vent pâlit légèrement, mais elle se redresse aussitôt avant de lâcher :{/n} « Au temps pour moi, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je vais prendre les mesures nécessaires pour qu'une telle situation ne se reproduise plus. »
languages.original_text: {n}Vent pales slightly, but straightens up and clips out,{/n} "Forgive me, Lord Captain. I will take steps to ensure such a thing does not happen again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vent pâlit légèrement, mais elle se redresse aussitôt avant de lâcher :{/n} « Au temps pour moi, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je vais prendre les mesures nécessaires pour qu'une telle situation ne se reproduise plus. »

languages.text: {n}Benzi solan Vent, hemen toparlanıp cevap veriyor.{/n} "Bağışlayın Lord Kaptan. Böyle bir şeyin tekrar yaşanmaması için gerekeni yapacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}Vent pales slightly, but straightens up and clips out,{/n} "Forgive me, Lord Captain. I will take steps to ensure such a thing does not happen again."
